mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.TITLE AS title ,A.CONTENT AS content ,B.ID AS writer ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDate ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updateDate ,A.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS cnt FROM BOARD A JOIN USERS B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_NO ORDER BY boardNo DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo ,A.TITLE AS title ,A.CONTENT AS content ,B.ID AS writer ,DATE_FORMAT(A.REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS registDate ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updateDate ,A.VIEW_CNT AS viewCnt ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS cnt FROM BOARD A JOIN USERS B ON A.WRITER = B.USER_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY boardNo DESC
